channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 16:10 Return the threats of the shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take the following reports.
item.description: 🟢 16:10 Return the threats of the shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take the following reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 16:10 Attention! Droze Dronov-Kamikadze
